amendment.description: To provide the flexibility to consider all available transportation funding options.

vote.text: Amendment SA 225 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 81 - 19. Record Vote Number: 72.

action.text: Amendment SA 225 proposed by Senator Talent. (consideration: CR S2932; text: CR S2932) To provide the flexibility to consider all available transportation funding options.
